body: @sonirexs Where can i find this prequel game? I must know for science!
Nice Chapter 3 Misoginy Conquest is cool

This doujin will have a game with RPG format, the devteam said in the twitter, the game will be released by the time when the chapter 6 of this doujin come out. Of course the game will be in japanese language, but if you want to play without willing to wait the game to get translated, you can use software like textractor (from github) to translate the game dialogue, it's machine translated and need internet connection

This series has prequel but mainly about possession man to woman, the prequel are game SRPG called sister possession 1 and 2, the game is in japanese language but now the translation to english still progressing for the first game.  Spoiler alert for the game:




The MC [hero] and his group has possession ability but can only possess female, they fight enemies to defend their country, after peace time, their advanced ancestors technologies which store data soul of the men from the past leaked out, in order them to live in the current era they must possess female body, but almost all the men ancestors are evil, so MC and his group fight again to retake the possessed woman's right.

There is one scene when all of the female church executives and female saint knights already tired to pretending to be woman of that body (they can read memories of the body,mimic their personality)  and that era's law so they tried to kill all other obstacle (men in that era who protects the law) in one go.
So the pirate brother is now on the queen’s body? (to bad for the king, got to swap in the worst moment posible)
But they csnt fck it now lmao
